short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WallMaster: a browser extension to personalize your browsing with favorite images, colors. Easy way to enhance browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WallMaster is a simple and user-friendly Chrome extension that lets you customize your browser's home page background with your favorite images.

With WallMaster, you can choose any image and set it as your Chrome new tab or window wallpaper with just a few clicks. The extension supports high-quality images and features a clean interface, making it easy for you to manage your wallpapers and switch between them as often as you like. WallMaster is perfect for anyone who wants to personalize their browsing experience and make their home page feel more like their own.

The extension also changes the user's search engine to be powered by Yahoo.

Changing your background is simple and only requires the following steps:
1. Click on the extension's icon in the top right corner of the browser
2. Choose the image you want to set as your background
3. Click on the "Submit" button
4. Enjoy your new background

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the "WallMaster" Chrome extension and setting Chromeâ„¢ New Tab search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. The extension will update your search settings and will change your New Tab search services provided by Yahoo.
